style="background:#009933" rowspan="1" width=140px| Combatant 2 ! style="background:#009933" rowspan="1" width=250px| Results |- |style="background:#efefef"| Casamance Conflict (1982-2014) |style="background:#efefef"| |style="background:#efefef"| MFDC |style="background:#E0D0FF"| Low level ongoing *MFDC declares a unilateral ceasefire. |- |style="background:#efefef"| Mauritania–Senegal Border War (1989-1991) |style="background:#efefef"| FLAM |style="background:#efefef"| |style="background:#E0D0FF"| Indecisive *Peace agreement, end of skirmishes. |- |style="background:#efefef"| First Liberian Civil War (1990-1993) |style="background:#efefef"| ULIMO ECOMOG |style="background:#efefef"| NPFL INPFL |style="background:#E0D0FF"| Withdrawal *Senegalese withdrawal by 1993. |- |style="background:#efefef"| Guinea-Bissau Civil War (1998-1999) |style="background:#efefef"| |style="background:#efefef"| Military rebels |style="background:#FFD0D0"| Defeat *Ousting of João Bernardo Vieira. |- |style="background:#efefef"| Invasion of Anjouan (2008) |style="background:#efefef"| |style="background:#efefef"| |style="background:#D0FFD0"| Victory *Toppling of Mohamed Bacar, replacement of Anjouan's government. |- |style="background:#efefef"| Intervention in Yemen (2015-) |style="background:#efefef"| Hadi government |style="background:#efefef"| Houthi government * Houthis * Saleh loyalists |style="background:#E0D0FF"| Ongoing *Houthis dissolve Yemeni government. *Houthis take control of northern Yemen. |- |style="background:#efefef"| ECOWAS military intervention in the Gambia (2017-) |style="background:#efefef"| Coalition 2016 |style="background:#efefef"| MFDC Jungulars |style="background:#D0FFD0"| Victory *Yahya Jammeh steps down peacefully, minimal combat between the two sides. |} == References == Senegal Wars Category:Wars involving Senegal
title: List of wars involving Senegal
